Help:Node.title: take
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: $(keyword) [object]; or $(keyword) [object] from [container]
EXAMPLE: $(keyword) potato; $(keyword) potato from pouch
Picks up an object. If an object is in a container (a pouch, a bag, a chest, etc) you must specifically remove the object from the container ($(keyword) gold from pouch; $(keyword) key from chest).
SEE ALSO: ,
